Name: Adios Amigos #2
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: We have added a dash of sugar to what was originally a bone dry recipe.
Nutrition: One serving of Adios Amigos #2 contains 189 calories
